item.title: Q factor
item.description: Explanation In physics and engineering, the quality factor or Q factor is a dimensionless parameter that describes how underdamped an oscillator or resonator is.

item.title: What is dB
item.description: dB is short for decibel, which is a unit that indicates ratio or gain.Â It is often used to measure sound intensity, signal strength, attenuation and other quantities.
